caption.title: Modelling the interactions between Geldanamycin and swine HSP90AB1.
caption.p: (A) The predicted 3D structure of the Geldanamycin-binding domain of swine HSP90AB1 and its interaction with Geldanamycin. (B) RMSD of all CÎ± atoms for the ligand (black) and receptor-ligand complex (red) during MD simulations (10 ns).
